name: Crisp
description: Crisp is an all-in-one customer messaging platform designed to enhance business communication through live chat, chatbots, and CRM integration.
longDescription: Crisp is a comprehensive customer messaging platform that integrates live chat, AI-powered chatbots, and CRM tools to streamline customer support, sales, and marketing for businesses of all sizes. Founded in 2015, it aims to revolutionize customer support by offering a user-friendly, omnichannel solution that centralizes communication from various channels like email, WhatsApp, and social media into a single inbox. Its mission is to empower businesses to build stronger customer relationships through personalized, efficient, and automated interactions. Crisp’s AI-driven features, such as automated workflows and chatbots, reduce team workload by up to 50%, allowing for scalable and humanized customer experiences. The platform is fully bootstrapped, emphasizing innovation and flexibility without external pressures, and supports over 600,000 businesses globally. It is particularly valued for its lightweight chat widget and deep integrations with tools like Shopify and Zapier.
features: The omnichannel inbox centralizes messages from live chat, email, WhatsApp, and social media for efficient team collaboration.
AI-powered chatbots automate responses to common inquiries, reducing support team workload by up to 50%.
The integrated CRM synchronizes customer and lead data for personalized and context-aware interactions.
A customizable knowledge base allows businesses to create self-service FAQs to reduce support queries.
Live chat widget enables real-time engagement with website visitors, boosting conversions and support quality.
Automated workflows streamline internal tasks and trigger context-based customer messages across channels.
LiveTranslate supports multilingual chat by automatically translating messages in real-time for global audiences.
The platform integrates with tools like Shopify, Zapier, and Slack to enhance operational efficiency.
Proactive chat invitations engage website visitors based on their behavior, improving customer interaction.
Co-browsing allows agents to guide customers through websites in real-time, enhancing support experiences.

faqs.question: What is Crisp primarily used for?
faqs.answer: Crisp is used for customer messaging, combining live chat, chatbots, and CRM to improve support, sales, and marketing.

faqs.question: Does Crisp offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Crisp offers a free plan with unlimited live chat and basic features, suitable for small businesses.

faqs.question: Can Crisp integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Crisp integrates with tools like Shopify, Zapier, Slack, and WhatsApp to streamline business operations.

faqs.question: How does Crisp’s chatbot work?
faqs.answer: Crisp’s AI-powered chatbot automates responses to common queries using a no-code visual flow builder, escalating complex issues to human agents.

faqs.question: Is Crisp suitable for small businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, Crisp is designed for small to medium businesses, offering affordable plans and scalable features.

faqs.question: Can I customize the Crisp chat widget?
faqs.answer: Yes, the chat widget is fully customizable to match your brand and can be embedded in minutes.

faqs.question: Does Crisp support multilingual communication?
faqs.answer: Crisp’s LiveTranslate feature enables real-time translation for multilingual customer interactions.

faqs.question: How secure is Crisp’s platform?
faqs.answer: Crisp uses state-of-the-art cryptography to protect user data and ensure secure communication.
